"Oh hey, I was just being told a story a: "Something something, if I developed better, her pride would be this and that. I don't understand the context behind it, so could you elaborate?"
"It's as I said before, if Sara was bigger, then I would have been bigger too, and I would have a nice composure with a similar aura...!"
"Huh? You don't sound very enthusiastic, you ok?"
"Perhaps it's something you did from the last time you've met?"
"...Well you see, big sis' older brother just died."
"It actually turned into something serious!? Wait, I must look like someone who can't read the mood....!"
"There's no need to worry! All of the things considered to be my siblings are all dead and I've lost all of them! We're the same! The same!"
"That's totally different! And your reply was awful!"
"Even if you've told me that...! Oh right! <%me>! Show us that thing! That thing you do that comforts people!"
"That's..right. You're experienced in this sort of thing, <%me>, you can do something about it."

"Eheha. I'm fine, I don't need comforting. I'm ok.
I'm sorry for making you all worried."

"Right, if I become depressed,
everyone will worry.
I have to work on hiding this feeling."
"Everyone, thank you. I'm fine, so please don't worry about me. Now... let's go Aru."
"<%me>. You probably already know, but Hitsugi is pushing herself too hard."
"You know how dangerous that can get when someone is like that, right? Please keep an eye on her as much as possible."
